ComicInfo.Title: The Next Best Thing!; Promise Her Anything - Part 1; Double Your Pleasure; Promise Her Anything - Part 2; I've Fallen and I Can't Get Up; Promise Her Anything - Part 3
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 12:19:12. [CVDB248643] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 01:51:07. [Issue ID 328828]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Next Best Thing!: Skip and Binah are worlds apart... but this kind of cybersex couldn't get 'em closer.
Promise Her Anything - Part 1: Women create the perfect male but even the resulting android has thoughts of his own.
Double Your Pleasure: Jana and Peter, former lovers, must exchange bodies to fix their spaceship. But entering his body proves an overly heady experience for the highly sexually charged Jan, with strange and dire consequences.
Promise Her Anything - Part 2: Women create the perfect male but even the resulting android has thoughts of his own.
I've Fallen and I Can't Get Up: It's hard to carry on a torrid affair when you're one of three people in a small space station... and the third wheel is your husband.
Promise Her Anything - Part 3: Women create the perfect male but even the resulting android has thoughts of his own.
